Package edu.ncsu.csc216.service_wolf.model.manager

Class ServiceWolfManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.service_wolf.model.manager.ServiceWolfManager
  • public class ServiceWolfManager
extends java.lang.Object
    service group manager is an object with no fields that provides methods that work with service groups. has a save to file and a load from file for servcie groups. a gett incidets as array for the GUI a get incident by id a delete incident by id an add incident to service group and a clear service group.
    Author:
    edwin
